author: John Montgomery
comment: Quite likely the most beautiful face I've seen for square watches.
title: Excellent

author: Todd Dixon
comment: But, it's a battery drainer on the LG watch R
title: Great Watch Face

author: Joseph Daniel
comment: I paid for this and it said installed but I can't figure out how to make it appear on the moto 360 watch. Someone help please

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content:
Hi Joseph,

once purchased it has to be installed in your Android Wear device. For that you'll have to sync your apps with your watch using the Android Wear App that Google offers. Let us know if you have more questions.

title: How to install

author: Paul Brassington
comment: Love the look of this,  nicer to have an option for the date
title: Beauty in a watch face

author: Oriol Mercadé
comment: It looks so so nice in my MOTO 360!  all the people keeps staring at it :) That face became my favorite!
title: The nicest round face i own!

author: Christopher Chang
comment: It'd be great if you had the option of having a black face color all the time.  It would be a much smoother and less noticeable transition from active to standby and it would give the option for smoother blending with the edges of the watch (I use the Gear Live, which has a black frame).
title: Chris Chang
